title.en: Prayer Composed for Yakzé Tsewang Gyurme

text.en: Primordial protector Samantabhadra, universal splendour of existence and peace,
text.en-trans: sizhi chi pal kunzang dömé gön

text.en: Appearing as a friend to dispel the darkness from my mind in this degenerate age,
text.en-trans: nyikdü dak lö münpa selwé nyen

text.en: Dance-like emanation of the Mañjughoṣa Guru’s1pristine wisdom,
Lodrö Gyatso, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: lodrö gyatsö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Until I awaken, hold me in your care without ever parting.
As I call out to you with intense and ardent devotion,
May I realize the dharmakāya luminosity of awareness and emptiness,
And may I attain the vajrakāya, the rainbow body of great transference.2
text.en-trans: pochen jalü dorjé ku tob shok
